ygData.subject: getting along (was: RE Petiton to replace level 14 song)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Which is why I post the FAQ - please read it ;) On a bardicly related note, I am collecting ideas for a petition, and in my opinion, the two best so far
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:21 AM 9/22/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>I don't mean this as a dig to anyone in particular but this is a great list
>and I really think we should all work hard on refraining from calling one
>another's ideas stupid or silly. We have over 300 members in our list and
>about 10-20 who post regularly - that means we have a lot of lurkers and we
>don't want people to be afraid to speak up for fear of being berated or
>belittled for their opinion.

Which is why I post the FAQ - please read it ;)

On a bardicly related note, I am collecting ideas for a petition, and in my
opinion, the two best so far that haven't been addressed elsewhere are
"party-effect" on Libretto, and rearrangeable spellbook. BTW, I've already
heard from Brad on that one - it would require INCREDIBLE amounts of
programming that they can't do right now. *hrm* Oh well. We can look at
other stuff, and "remind" them that we still want to rearrange our spellbook ;)

Talies the Moderator
